subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: For the first time since taking over the United States’ men’s national team, Jurgen Klinsmann is feeling the heat from fans, former players and the news media.
snippet: For the first time since taking over the United States’ men’s national team, Jurgen Klinsmann is feeling the heat from fans, former players and the news media.
